hero_two.title: Elevate your Game, Empower Your Club

hero_three.title: The Future of Football Starts Here
hero_three.subtitle: Intelligent scouting, performance analytics, and real-time communication
hero_three.description: 11 Hype helps clubs and agencies discover top talent, analyze team performance, and stay connected with players, fans, and sponsors. Say goodbye to outdated management and hello to innovation.

one.title: Scheduling & Realtime Messaging
one.description: Coordinate practices, matches, and events with seamless communication tools that keep your entire club connected.

two.title: AI-Scouting & Recruitment Tools
two.description: Identify rising stars and top talents using advanced performance analytics and data-driven insights.

three.title: Club & Facility Management
three.description: Manage teams, rosters, and facility bookings with intuitive scheduling tools designed for clubs of all sizes.

four.title: Marketplace & Sponsorship Hub
four.description: Monetize your club with branded merchandise, sponsorship opportunities, and a powerful marketplace.

five.title: Performance Analytics
five.description: Dive deep into player and team stats with easy-to-understand performance tracking and analysis.

six.title: Integrated Communication
six.description: Chat, share files, collaborate in real-time — all within the platform.

closer_look.title: A CLOSER LOOK AT 11HYPE IN ACTION
closer_look.subtitle: Explore the powerful tools designed to streamline your club management, scouting, and monetization.

one.text: Comprehensive scheduling for matches, practices and events. Easily manage recurring practice sessions and game schedules

two.text: Track facility usage and availability. Assign and manage facility access for teams, coaches, and staff. Simplify maintenance requests with integrated issue

three.text: Team/player communication with built-in translations. Instant group messaging with read receipts for better accountability. Share training schedules, match updates, and announcements in one place.

four.text: Social media tools for sharing highlights and connecting.

five.text: Robust marketplace for Training, Equipment and Services. Upcoming branded marketplace stores for clubs (coming soon).

six.text: It is thoughtfully designed as a centralized hub for football enthusiasts, integrating the best aspects of advanced technology into a single, cohesive platform.

one.title: Empowering Football Communities
one.description: We are dedicated to helping clubs, coaches, scouts, and players thrive by providing tools that streamline management and enhance collaboration.

two.title: Innovation at Our Core
two.description: We leverage cutting-edge technology, including AI and analytics, to revolutionize the way football clubs operate and grow.

three.title: Connection & Growth
three.description: Our platform bridges gaps, connecting clubs, scouts, players, and agents globally to strengthen collaboration and grow the football community.

four.title: Transparency & Integrity
four.description: We value honesty and transparency, ensuring clubs and players have access to clear data, fair opportunities, and reliable tools.

five.title: Supporting Club Growth
five.description: Through our integrated marketplace and sponsorship hub, we help clubs unlock new revenue streams and grow sustainably.

one.title: Sign up and Set up Club
one.content: Create your club profile and invite your team members. Customize your club settings, rosters, and communication tools.

two.title: Manage Teams & Facilities
two.content: Schedule matches, practices, and events with ease. Oversee facility bookings, ensuring smooth club operations.

three.content: Discover top talent using AI-driven performance tracking.View real-time player statistics and recruitment insights.
